MindMesh_UI_UX_Master_Spec.scope: Complete, exhaustive UI and UX specification focused on interactions, visual motion, physics, rendering constraints, accessibility, onboarding, tutorials, error/fallback modes, export flows, and VR/AR behaviors â€” includes micro-interactions, timing curves, GPU draw budgets, latency targets, and every major user flow.
authors: Spec generated by assistant for MindMesh product team

goals.primary: Deliver an intuitive, discovery-friendly UI that exposes advanced power-user controls while remaining accessible, performant, and privacy-respecting.
secondary: Ensure predictable low-latency interactions across desktop, touch, and VR/AR.
Provide graceful degradation for low-power and low-storage devices.
Make onboarding fast and informative with progressive disclosure.
Provide reproducible export flows and clear privacy signals.

rendering_backend: OpenGL/Vulkan on desktop via Rust bindings
assumptions.hardware_range: low-end CPU with integrated GPU -> modern multi-core CPU + discrete GPU

ui_principles.privacy_first: All UI controls expose whenever data is local vs being exported/shared; export actions require explicit confirmation.
ui_principles.progressive_disclosure: Beginner-friendly defaults, advanced toggles under 'Advanced' or 'Power User' sections.
ui_principles.keyboard_first: All major flows accessible by keyboard; command palette for power users.
ui_principles.accessibility: ARIA + screen reader support, colorblind palettes, high contrast and motion-reduced modes.
ui_principles.performance_budgeting: Render budgets, draw-call caps, and GPU-friendly shader usage with fallbacks.

behaviors.collapse_on_scroll: small screens collapse title leaving icons
behaviors.status_badge: session indicators show colored badge (green=idle, yellow=running, red=error)

left_sidebar.drag_behavior: resizable with 1px shadow, snap grid at 60/300/420
left_sidebar.keyboard_nav: Ctrl/Cmd+1 cycles left panels, arrow up/down to select items

modals.layering: modals are topmost; non-blocking side-panels remain accessible unless modal demands attention.
modals.escape_behavior: Esc closes non-critical modals; Esc+Shift asks to confirm destructive ops

motion_system.reduced_motion: all non-essential animations reduce to fade-only or disable

steps.content: Project intro, privacy explanation (local-first), choose language, optional voice tutorial toggle
Highlight Canvas, Input Panel, Snapshot Manager (user must interact with each)
steps.interaction_requirement: user must click/tap hotspots to proceed

steps.content: User types a phrase or drags an image. System offers Auto-Embed (recommended) and Ultralite mapping. Show estimated neuron usage and storage cost.
steps.preview: instant activation footprint overlay (low-cost sample simulation for 3 steps)

steps.content: Run 10 simulation steps with mini-analytics. Show 'What you are seeing' callout explaining pulses and clusters.
Suggest name, auto-generate reproducibility manifest summary, offer interactive HTML export suggestion (size estimate).
'First Thought' badge unlocked, show next suggestions: 'Explore Analytics', 'Try Autonomous Mode', 'Connect LED Strip'.

preview_flow.compute_preview: procedural lightweight instantiation for preview (2-3 frames)
preview_flow.create_action: generate brain with progress modal (animated bar + neuron bloom)

project_creation_and_brain_generation.post_create_actions: open mapping wizard; show quick tour tip

mapping_editor_ui.pressure_support: pen pressure maps to brush strength
mapping_editor_ui.preview_overlay: semi-transparent activation heatmap updated at 10Hz (or 30Hz if highperf)

edge_cases_and_guidance.ambiguous_mapping: Show top-3 mapping suggestions with confidence & allow manual adjust

simulation_control_flow.step_mode: single-step with N micro-steps and UI highlight of affected clusters
simulation_control_flow.sandbox_preview: edits apply to ephemeral copy by default; explicit 'Apply to live' to commit
simulation_control_flow.auto_save_policy: periodic delta save every configurable N seconds or simulation steps
simulation_control_flow.resource_overrides: auto-pause when memory or energy budgets exceeded; show adaptive suggestions

live_editing_flow.selection_and_inspection: single click to select, double-click to open cluster view, F focuses selection
live_editing_flow.live_vs_sandbox_toggle: default sandbox; switch applies immediately if 'apply live' checked
live_editing_flow.rewiring_interaction: drag-from-node to node; preview path with color-coded predicted delta and energy estimate (computed via local heuristic)
live_editing_flow.undo_redo: multi-level with branching; show timeline of changes in bottom console

autonomous_experiment_flow.start_modal: show estimated resource usage and deterministic seed option; require consent for autonomous changes to persist
autonomous_experiment_flow.runtime_observability: non-intrusive notifications for emergent motifs with mini-preview; allow 'Promote to global' or 'Reject' actions
autonomous_experiment_flow.audit_log: detailed event list with timestamps and reproducibility manifest

analytics_and_report_flow.dashboard_ui: configurable charts + cluster explorer + timeline scrubber
analytics_and_report_flow.interaction: brush-to-zoom, click cluster in chart to focus on canvas, compare two snapshots side-by-side
analytics_and_report_flow.export: CSV/JSON export with reference to reproducibility manifest; interactive HTML snapshot with embedded charts

export_options_ui.delta_only_toggle: only store deltas since base snapshot
export_options_ui.procedural_recipe_option: store generator + seed instead of raw neurons

export_flow.size_estimation_engine: fast estimator samples cluster blobs and extrapolates; UI shows 'estimated size' and 'estimated time' given current CPU
export_flow.export_progress: progress bar + animated neuron bloom; allow pause & resume
export_flow.post_export: open folder, copy path, share via LAN (explicit consent)

collaboration_flow.discovery_and_joining: LAN broadcast if allowed; token-based join; optional QR code for mobile clients
collaboration_flow.sync_strategy: CRDT-like delta sync with serverless P2P/local host authority
collaboration_flow.conflict_resolution_ui: three-way visual diff; present 'accept local','accept remote','merge' with inline merging tools
collaboration_flow.session_security: optional password, session expiry, ephemeral tokens

error_fallback_and_recovery_flow.low_memory_mode: reduced LOD, pause particle systems, enforce ultralite mapping presets suggestion
error_fallback_and_recovery_flow.gpu_failure_mode: fallback to CPU renderer and show 'GPU fallback' toast with error log link
error_fallback_and_recovery_flow.disk_space_issue: cancel large exports, offer compression or alternate path, keep partial deltas
error_fallback_and_recovery_flow.plugin_failure: isolate & disable plugin; present 'retry in sandbox' and 'send debug bundle' option (user consent required)

hover.appearance: tooltip with 8px padding, 6px rounded radius, subtle shadow

click.feedback: 0.8x scale press with 40ms duration and spring easing

drag.line_preview: smooth thickening line with tension easing
drag.ghost_preview: semi-transparent copy follows cursor during drag
drag.snap_feedback: glow pulse when hovering drop target

panel_open_close.accessibility: announce via screen reader when panel opened

screen_reader.descriptions: all images/visualizations have textual description fallback generated from analytics summary

keyboard_navigation.tab_order: logical and predictable; focus outlines visible
keyboard_navigation.aria_shortcuts: announce shortcuts in 'Help' and via 'Keyboard Cheat Sheet' panel
keyboard_navigation.command_palette: keyboard-first discovery of all commands accessible entirely by keyboard

fallback_actions.visuals: switch to ultra_flat mode (dots only, no glow)
fallback_actions.simulation: reduce neuron count via sampling or auto-prune inactive neurons
fallback_actions.storage: use higher compression (zstd level 9) and suggest external storage for exports
fallback_actions.notifications: show 'low resource mode' badge and recommended actions

discoverability.first_run_suggestion_cards: top 3 actions relevant to user's platform
discoverability.contextual_hints: inline hints after 3 seconds of inactivity in a panel

error_messages.example: { 'title':'Out of Memory','details':'Simulation reached memory cap','suggested_action':'Switch to Ultralite or reduce neuron count' }

help_and_support.bug_report_flow: collect debug bundle with user consent (logs + snapshot diff)
help_and_support.tutorials_and_snippets: built-in recipe gallery with reproducible manifests

camera_motion.focus_transition: lerp position (duration 220ms) + slerp rotation (duration 220ms) with easeOutCubic

drag_physics.tension_line: Bezier-based curve with control points biased by current velocity
drag_physics.snap_energy_threshold: if energy < 0.02 then snap to grid
drag_physics.drag_throughput_limit: track pointer deltas at 240Hz maximum sampling to avoid input jitter

particle_dynamics.particle_system_physics: verlet integration for stable low-cost motion

long_running_autonomous_experiments.mitigation: hard caps (neuron_count, disk_usage), periodic checkpoints, notify user with required confirmation to continue
long_running_autonomous_experiments.autosalvage: if cap reached, create compressed emergency snapshot and pause experiment

plugin_misbehavior.mitigation: run plugins in separate processes, enforce CPU/time quotas, kill after threshold and mark plugin as 'faulty'
plugin_misbehavior.user_feedback: option to file fault report with debug bundle (local only unless user consents)

corrupt_snapshot.remediation: offer to apply journal replay, or restore previous delta checkpoint, or open read-only viewer

unexpected_gpu_driver_reset.behavior: auto-fallback to CPU render, preserve last frame as static image, notify user with 'report and continue' options

size_and_time_estimation_engine.method: sample cluster blobs + compress simulation timeline with chosen bitrate; use CPU benchmark to estimate encode time
size_and_time_estimation_engine.ui_feedback: show 'Estimated size: 34.1MB; Estimated time: 72s (on your device)'

export_progress_and_resume.progress_visual: progress bar + particle animation; expandable details panel for step-level status
export_progress_and_resume.resume_policy: export jobs are checkpointed; resume after restart if no corruption
export_progress_and_resume.failure_handling: on failure, keep partial artifacts and show actions: retry, export smaller, open diagnostics

privacy_checks_before_export.scan_for_user_inputs: if mapping includes user files, show explicit consent modal listing included content
privacy_checks_before_export.opt_out_options: strip user_input_data, anonymize labels, or encrypt exports

usability_metrics_and_telemetry_guidelin.policy: telemetry disabled by default; opt-in only with clear banner
usability_metrics_and_telemetry_guidelin.local_metrics_store: if enabled, store metrics locally with clear TTL and export option
usability_metrics_and_telemetry_guidelin.privacy_controls: complete purge, export, and view of collected metrics from Settings

contextual_hints_engine.dismissal: click outside or press Esc; remember preference per feature

help_tips_and_tutorials.searchable_help_index: offline-first, full-text search with fuzzy matching and examples

developer_documentation_and_assets.design_tokens: exportable JSON of colors, sizes, easing presets, spacing
developer_documentation_and_assets.component_library: React/Tauri preview components + CSS variables for theming
developer_documentation_and_assets.animation_library: synced with design tokens; include Lottie-friendly variants for onboarding
developer_documentation_and_assets.sample_assets: neuron SVGs, particle GIFs, shader source snippets (GLSL) for glow, edge gradients

performance_test_protocols.test_100k: instantiate 100k neurons, default topology; run interactive sim for 60s; measure FPS, draw_calls, memory_peak
performance_test_protocols.test_export_1080p: export 60s MP4 1080p; measure time-to-export on target hardware profiles

change_log.changes: Initial exhaustive UI/UX + physics + rendering budget spec generated
